plugin.name: fast-switcher
plugin._long: A plugin to switch active window.

option.name: activate
option._long: Activates fast switcher with the specified key, moving to the next view.

option.name: activate_backward
option._long: Activates fast switcher with the specified key, moving to the previous view.

option.name: inactive_alpha
option._long: Set the opacity value of the inactive windows.
